#Binance Publishes Latest Proof of Reserves

@Binance has released its latest Proof of Reserves snapshot dated December 1, providing updated visibility into user asset balances and reaffirming full collateralization for custodial holdings.

Key user holdings include:
‚Ä¢ 617,620 $BTC
‚Ä¢ 4.04 million $ETH
‚Ä¢ 39.42 million $BNB
‚Ä¢ 34.30 billion $USDT

Month to month movements:
‚Ä¢ $BTC increased 4.00%, reflecting continued accumulation.
‚Ä¢ $ETH decreased 1.32%, marking steady outflows.
‚Ä¢ $USDT decreased 1.24%, indicating reduced stablecoin balances.
‚Ä¢ $BNB increased 4.06%, the strongest rise among major assets.

The Proof of Reserves system allows users to verify inclusion of their balances through a Merkle tree and zk SNARK process. All user assets remain backed 1 to 1, separate from corporate funds, and fully viewable in the public report.

Full snapshot: https://t.co/j2uWtYn6FH

$BNB  edged up 0.72% to $900.28, supported by improving technical structure and renewed confidence around Binance‚Äôs balance-sheet strength, with Proof of Reserves showing BTC holdings up 4% MoM to 617,620 BTC and $BNB  over-collateralized at 112.32%.   On the chart, price reclaimed the 7-day SMA and is attempting to hold above the $890 pivot, while a bullish MACD crossover and neutral RSI (~47) suggest upside momentum is building without overbought conditions.   Despite broader market fear (Fear & Greed at 24), $BNB ‚Äôs relative outperformance versus BTC and ETH points to asset-specific demand, though resistance near $913‚Äì$965 remains key. CZ Responds to Stepping Down as Binance CEO: Actually Cried While Writing the Blog  

On December 3rd at Binance Blockchain Week, Binance founder CZ discussed his experience of stepping down as CEO during a group media interview. He mentioned that he had shed tears while writing his stepping-down blog at 4 a.m. in Seattle, and it took him some time to calm down afterward. CZ noted that he did not engage in specific affairs during his year in the United States after resigning, and felt deeply relieved to see Binance operating well without the need for his excessive involvement upon his return. Currently, CZ has shifted more of his focus to the BNB Chain ecosystem, concentrating on supporting the development of various related projects. 

Video Source: Binance Blockchain Week 2025

A Bullish Market Demands Smart Positioning

In bullish conditions, capital tends to flow toward projects with clear utility, transparent goals, and long-term potential. Grove Token checks all three boxes. Its expanding ecosystem‚Äîincluding GroveSwap, GroveX Exchange, and integration on BNB Chain‚Äîoffers real value and practical utility for traders and developers alike.

Zero Tax, Maximum Efficiency

One of the boldest advantages of Grove Token in a market upswing is its 0% tax structure on buying, selling, and transferring. In a bullish market where trading volume spikes and investors look for fast, flexible movement, this no-tax model becomes a major competitive differentiator.

A Vision Aligned With Growth

Grove Token‚Äôs mission for a brighter and greener financial future aligns perfectly with emerging market trends. As blockchain technology pushes toward sustainability and efficiency, Grove Token stands at the forefront with a clear roadmap and expanding real-world utility.

Why Act Now?

Momentum matters. A bullish market rewards early, strategic positioning‚Äîespecially in ecosystems poised for accelerated development. With new listings, growing liquidity, and continuous adoption across platforms, Grove Token offers investors a powerful combination of timing, utility, and long-term potential.

The Rise of Binance üöÄ

From 0 to 300 million users (the story of the world's largest crypto empire)

Here's how it happened üëá

> in 2017, changpeng zhao (@cz_binance) was already a veteran 
> in crypto he had worked at blockchaincom and okcoin, learning the industry inside out.

> cz saw the problems with existing exchanges: high fees, poor user experience, and slow customer 
> support he decided to build something better, faster, and more accessible.

> binance raised $15 million through an ico in just 15 days 
> selling bnb tokens that would later become one of the most valuable cryptocurrencies.

> they launched the platform in july 2017 with a small team 
> working 20-hour days to build features and fix bugs in real-time.

> within just 6 months, binance became the largest crypto exchange by trading volume 
> processing millions of transactions daily and shocking the entire industry.
> their secret is incredibly low trading fees (0.1%), fast execution, and listing new coins quickly 
> while competitors were slow and expensive, binance was fast and cheap.

> in 2018, when the crypto winter hit and prices crashed 80%+ 
> many exchanges went bankrupt, but binance survived and even thrived.
> they focused on building trust through their safu fund (secure asset fund for users) 

> setting aside money to protect users in case of security breaches.
> binance expanded globally at lightning speed, supporting 200+ countries 
> and adding multiple languages to make crypto accessible worldwide.

> they launched binance coin (bnb) which started at $0.10 
> and grew to become a top 5 cryptocurrency worth hundreds of dollars.
> in 2020, binance smart chain (bsc) was launched as an ethereum alternative 

> offering faster transactions and lower fees, attracting thousands of projects.
> they didn't stop at trading - binance built an entire ecosystem: 
> binance academy for education, binance charity, binance labs for startups, and binance nft marketplace.

> by 2021, binance was processing over $76 billion in daily trading volume 
> more than coinbase, kraken, and other competitors combined.
> they served over 120 million registered users worldwide making binance the face of crypto for millions of people.

> despite facing regulatory pressure from the us, uk, and other countries 
> binance hired compliance teams and worked to meet regulations in every market.
> in 2023, cz stepped down as ceo as part of a settlement with us authorities but binance continued to operate and maintain its dominant position.

> And today @binance obtained full licensing from abu dhabi's fsra becoming one of the most regulated crypto exchanges in the world.
> binance pay merchants exploded from 12,000 to 21 million in just one year

> their security systems prevented nearly $7 billion in scams
> they blocked $14 billion in attempted illicit activity showing their commitment to compliance and user safety.
> Now serves nearly 300 million users worldwide 
> 1 out of every 2 crypto users globally is on binance

from a small team with a laptop & a dream to dominating the entire crypto industry.

binance proved that speed, innovation, and relentless execution can change everything.

a reminder that in crypto, the bold and fast win. üí™

The empire built will be remembered forever.

$BNB is in a state of extreme short-term consolidation, trading almost perfectly flat at 2911.17.

The negligible 0.03% change indicates a complete standoff between buyers and sellers, forming a tight equilibrium. 

This follows a significant and sustained downtrend, as shown by the much lower reference price of 886.38, suggesting the current flatline is a pause within a larger bearish structure. 

The immediate price action is compressed into a narrow channel between approximately 873.00 and 886.00, highlighting a critical zone for a breakout.

This high-level consolidation after a major decline often precedes the next decisive directional move. Until it breaks decisively above the 886 resistance or below the 873 support, the technical posture remains neutral but vulnerable to a continuation of the prior downtrend.

I‚Äôve been watching $BNB‚Äôs move and the picture still looks mixed to me. The 2.33% rise to about $909.22 in 24 hours is solid, but it still came in just under the wider market‚Äôs 2.73% gain, so it doesn‚Äôt fully feel like strong momentum. The full Abu Dhabi license adds some reassurance since clearer regulation across spot, derivatives, and custody reduces a lot of the uncertainty that has followed $BNB and BNB Chain since 2023, and the jump in trading volume to around $1.93B shows traders reacted quickly. But even with that kind of regulatory win, it doesn‚Äôt automatically translate into steady demand for $BNB itself.


Technically, $BNB has improved a bit. The MACD crossover is stronger, RSI has recovered toward the mid 50s, and price is still hovering around the 30-day SMA. It still feels more like a cautious test than a breakout, and the next real hurdle sits near $932 resistance. I keep thinking about how support for bnb and other bsc tokens from platforms like bitget through things like the onchain 85 trading competition shapes trader behaviour because incentives can make participation feel more like opportunity than conviction.


The speculative side is louder too. Polymarket traders placing low-priced bets on $BNB hitting $1,500 by the end of 2025 shows where retail imagination is drifting, but with thin liquidity and close to a trillion dollars in derivatives open interest tied to $BNB, it naturally adds volatility. And while the roadmap signal from coinbase is helpful, on-chain TVL on $BNB Chain still hasn‚Äôt fully recovered. So for now, it feels less like a confirmed trend shift and more like the market thinking out loud.
